resources.string: Select the order in which you prefer to have the movies sorted.
Get an API key from themoviedb.org and enter it here, this is required for all access to that database.

You will need to register and obtain an API key from the moviedb.org. For registration use https://www.themoviedb.org/account/signup. Once registered, log into your account at https://www.themoviedb.org. Select API on the left column. Then generate an API Key on that page. It may take a few days to receive your key via email. The keys are very long, so take care entering it. You may edit your API Key on the Settings menu.
